name: Populous: The Beginning
description: This patch will enhance all landscape textures. This will have effect on all original levels and all new worlds, this will make many maps look better.
content:
extends: populous-the-beginning-103
files:
- displacementsPatch:
    filename: TGDP.exe
    referer: https://www.popre.net/downloads.php?f=12
    url: https://www.popre.net/files/TGDP.exe
installer:
- task:
    args: null
    description: Installing optional graphics improvements ...
    executable: displacementsPatch
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
